list.name: List Type
list.description: Select whether you are installing this on your anime or manga list. This is required for the cover images to work.

username.name: Your MyAnimeList Username
username.description: Must be entered exactly as it appears on MyAnimeList. While not required, this will reduce the page load impact from the cover images by more than 95% for most users.

tags.name: Tag Support / Hover Tags
tags.description: Add tag support using this mod by Hahaido. [b]If you deviate from the recommended columns in any way other than enabling Tags then this addon will break.[/b]
